directions.step:
Drain fruit, reserve 3 T. of juice and 1/2 cup fruit cocktail.
Notes: By AnnMarie Stauffer, Nesquehoning. The Times News, PA
Combine remaining fruit dessert topping, banana, marshmallow, coconut and reserved juice. Mix lightly 1/2 cup fruit mixture to fill each crepe.
Garnish with additional topping and fruit. To freeze crepes stack with waxed paper between. Wrap in heavy foil or freezer paper. Will keep 3 months frozen. Thaw at room temperature. Heat in a 350Â° oven 10-15 minutes. Serves 4.
Posted to recipelu-digest by ncanty@juno.com (Nadia I Canty) on Mar 9, 1998
